documents.document:
Inter Milan announced Zanetti two consecutive missed


Inter Milan will usher in yet another battle of the top three battle, the opponent is the last round has confirmed that the downgrade of Cesena, but the opponents bottom of the rankings, but the game who want to break into the Champions League next season, Inter Milan, still Can not be taken lightly.

Manchester Rama “, although it has been downgraded, but Cesena against juventus-soccer-jersey is still playing very good look at the performance of their game, they just lost the game in the last ten minutes.” Johnny in the race the first to remind his players before the conference, “We are pregnant with Cesena, with respect, but tomorrow’s Inter Milan performance, because we want to win the next game, in front of their home crowd, Inter Milan want to do better hope that victory. “

These two days, Guardiola announced to leave Barcelona, the Italian media immediately analyze said Moratti hope that Guardiola coached Inter Milan. Manchester Rama Johnny said: “such a thing, nothing to say, but Mr. President’s speech yesterday to me the strength, but also to the team the power of Inter Milan is a united whole. Moratti Mr. We are satisfied with his team’s performance against Udinese, we hope to be able to play well, the Champions League goal. “

Third Moratti Manchester Rama Johnny set a target, “For us, this is indeed a very important task in need of a positive confrontation, but we just want to own things. the last five games, Inter Milan need to do is very good, we have to make fewer mistakes, can not even make mistakes, although now the opportunity to change, but we still have to think about the match against Cesena, perhaps in the final end when there will be new changes. it comes to the end of the season changes, Manchester Rama Johnny said: “May 15, the President will make a decision, which offer players renewal which players I and other people, but now, my future is Inter Milan’s match against Cesena. “

Is Milito or Pacini, has also become the focus of attention this season, Manchester Rama Johnny said: “Milito is very good, but he was injured against Udinese, but the most recent fairly normal training. Pacini also good, and he is very good in training, I think tomorrow will be a part of he game. “But today’s game, Zanetti will still be missed because of injury, the Sri Lankan commander said: “We have a huge team of players on the pitch will always do everything we can, and now the game is more intense, so some of the problems caused by the doctor’s attention, but our relationship is very good hole and I maintained a very good relationship, we are looking for a more effective way to protect the players. “

Prior the Liwa Jia and other teenager upgrade to the first team round of competition, Manchester Rama Johnny enlisted Mbaye, “He is a very good defensive player, good physical condition, right foot, superior, in the youth team has been a good show, the reason I tune up, Samuel, Chivu and captain are missed because of injury. “Manchester Rama Johnny also talked about the Samu Ai Seoul, Samuel is an indispensable player of Inter Milan, I think he will be back in against Parma. Fran? on one, I think he better stay in Milan training, he also did , tomorrow’s game, I think he can be played. “

Win over Udinese, greatly improved the morale of Inter Milan, Manchester Rama Johnny said: “I think we must continue to grow, and the first half of the game against Udinese, we do very well team organization is very good, and Milito have made great contributions, while Wesley Sneijder and Alvarez, moving without the ball is also very good, but tomorrow’s game will be a completely different game. “and Sneijder back after two, the state has been elevated to a high level, “I think Sneijder kicked a very good game, but this is a victory for the team, I will not evaluate a person alone, because Cesar made two excellent saves. long Tomosuke against Udinese, is also very good, he won the winning penalty against Siena against Florence is also good to create an opportunity at Udinese on the defensive end, is also very good. “

Mbaye, Li Wajia selected, so that the Inter Milan jerseys squad constantly young Sri Lankan commander said: “The young players need time, youth team and Serie A are very different from the Liwa Gu, Mbaye and other young players with us only a few weeks, and now Inter Milan has entered a relatively good period of time, we played a lot of games, so the plan may include our own young players. “and talking about the Ravitch plan, Manchester Rama Johnny opened the the doctor holes than a joke, “I like my players.”

Attached to Inter Milan 22 squad:

Goalkeepers: Julio Cesar, Custer Lacy, Orlandoni

Defenders: Cordoba, Lucio, Maicon, Mascherano Zia, Mbaye, Farah Nocioni, Juan, long Tomosuke

Midfielders: Sneijder, Alvarez, melons, Lin, Polly, Esteban Cambiasso, Austria

Forwards: Pacini, Fran, Diego Milito, Zarate, Liwa Gu

Real Madrid's fourth midfielder jumped into the main

The Granero effect still continues. Sevilla match, “Pirates” once again Alonso around and play a very high level. data opta shows the field, the Real Madrid team pass up to 576 times, passing success rate of 89.2 percent, the two values are higher than the value in the last week with Bayern - 515 and 84.3%.

When Real Madrid announced starting in Seville, which coach Michelle frowned, he knew Granero play means that Real Madrid will be sent to a focus more on the ball and tie the line-up. With the short pass game, Granero with Alonso, Ozil repeatedly to find an offensive point of assault. “Pirates” in the midfield exists Bihedila distance when passing small 5 m, and the distance between the teammates, the same narrow, Real Madrid pass success rate is obvious.

The data is of course the most convincing. The number of passes of the field of Real Madrid team 576 times, 43 Granero individuals. Do not underestimate the passing of only 43 times, which the vast majority of short passes, series of team offensive pass, that is not one to let his teammates or ordered by Qupin or enough of them very difficult ball, in short, , his passing to his teammates feel comfortable. In addition, Granero pass success rate of 94%, but also a team-high.

Of course, in the eyes of Mourinho, Granero is not the main force, in practice if not in Las almost on a good personal move, “pirate” Alonso, Hedi, and Las Four midfield. Mourinho not want to use Granero’s tactical reasons, in his 4231 framework must be equipped with a defensive midfielder, no doubt, Hedi is a good candidate.

The Granero focus on with the foot of the living characteristics more suitable to play a diamond midfield in the traditional 442, however, in accordance with the idea of Jose Mourinho, if he wanted to play where you have to adapt to the lower back. Granero initially was no appropriate from this position, he explained, “I rarely play this position, just a kid played a few times, but most of the time my position or attacking midfielder. If you want to play defensive midfielder, you ask you to fast pass access, organization, team offense and defense. “in-depth as the season Granero gradually found feeling, especially in correcting some technical details of the action, such as the change in the ball when the first physical care of the ball, to avoid after rival steals such details, Granero into the new location.

Into 2012, the the Granero Cock silky counter-attack began. 21, Real Zaragoza match, Mourinho also began to trust Granero, had only played three times the pirates consecutive appearances, a total of 12 appearances, including nine starts. In his starting lineup nine games, Real Madrid, nine games unbeaten, scored a total of 37 goals and only scored seven goals. Development in accordance with the current situation, Granero has entered the battle of Mourinho, he will continue to stay at Real Madrid next season, and even play a more important role.

Pairs kill +Crazy scored seven goals Manchester city alread

Manchester City 1-0 Manchester United, the Premiership this season than a file on the Hollywood blockbusters should be interesting. Premiership 32 Manchester City 0-1 Arsenal, even Mancini admitted that the Premiership champions Manchester United foregone conclusion, but to the fat of the mouth and spits out, Wigan and Everton the attacks on the Premier League title race is once again full of suspense. Today the king of the mountain of war settled, said the championship Whispering Manchester City, although too early to say, but at least a group is seen as both rich pile to breed “” Blue Wizard “to get more money and the intention to play to prove to the football the original points very clear.

Manchester United 35 days can Kuangzhui Manchester 10, Manchester City within 20 days Kuangzhui Red Devils eight points, the Red Devils soldiers understand, if Manchester City to successfully win that next season the opponent will be more tough, Mancini built team concept of the ideal of “gradually move closer to Barcelona, Real Madrid,” the progressive realization of Manchester City finally took to the road of revival of the Chelsea model can not be stopped.

Record this season, Manchester City, is made to be broken. £ 27 million to buy Ruzhe Ke £ 24 million purchase Runasili £ 38 million to recruit Aguero, Manchester City to increase the attack strength last year to pay hundreds of millions of pounds, so they created a 13 before the start of league into the 43 balls, England’s top league in 48 years to start the record of highest number of goals. David - Silva this small nuclear power plants exist, since March 5, 2011 a 1-0 victory over Wigan Athletic 2-1 at home by March 21, 2012 Chelsea, Manchester City has created the English Premier Leagueappalling 20-game winning streak, broke the Premier League by Manchester United to keep winning streak at home 19. Is won again after the first time in 82 years, Christmas Champions League after playing 31 points will be beyond the team’s final 71 points in last season … eight points behind the leading five assigned, and then tied the integral …… Manchester City play too is the heartbeat.

Manchester Evening News columnist Stuart - Boer Nan said: “Now Manchester City as a whole, instead of the fragmented nature of the past.” Yaya - Toure rejected Manchester United’s invitation to go to Manchester City for Champions “pioneers cattle, “in order to enjoy the thrill of the entrepreneurs, Nasri to the desire of the championship, at the Gunners fans in the eyes of” money whore “. In retrospect, that the monetary level, the Manchester City players all of them are high, handsome, rich, but in the championship level, they are thoroughly woven La.

“If I Moli team of the season, I will without any complaints.” Lost to the night of the gunmen, high heart qi Mancini also expected in case the team can not win, their fate will be very lonely, unless there is a miracle Otherwise, the Manchester City fans will usher in a disappointing season, but the pessimists did not think football is the miracle of the group to be the founder of. 7 which reached the last eight seasons since the 2003-04 season, eight half-title, only the 2008-09 season, Liverpool incompetent to do so once that looks great may step the footsteps of Liverpool Manchester City but eventually comply with “the tide of history, is likely to be a windy full model. Kuangzhui 8 for three weeks! Manchester City is also expected to become a Premier League history of the first 35 games after ranking second is still the last reversal to win the team. Now split with Manchester United, and holding a 8 goal difference, Manchester City is in fact already pole in hand. The next round against Newcastle just big score lost to Wigan, but the strength of the final round of the Queen’s Park, Manchester City can challenge even the Chelsea 2009-10 season, 71 on goal difference to win the Premiership in the history of goal difference up to the championship records! Gunners fans, ironic slogan “you can not buy class, now seems to be” not “get rid of.

“In my conception, Manchester City is to become a team like Barcelona and Real Madrid, for many years, Manchester City will be a top team for me, the most important thing is to help Manchester City to change history. “before Mancini reflections. Game, the beginning of the season, Barry said with a smile slow as a snail firmly in control of the midfield, which “traitor” Carlos Tevez is clearly on the pitch your life. The temptation of Champions, who will go to care about the Fall of the dominant factors and the depravity of the bar of God. The victory of the Battle of King Mountain, Mancini is expected to become the Premier League for 20 years, 5 from the hands of Sir Alex Ferguson grabbed the championship trophy after Dalglish, Arsene Wenger, Jose Mourinho and Ancelotti coach. This season, twice Compagni and embarrassment Nani Manchester City won the shame of Manchester United, “For a club like Manchester United, there is no champion is a terrible thing, terrible Manchester City at this time also won the league title. “

26 years coaching Manchester United, Ferguson witnessed Manchester City 16 times the job to the change, and now finally met a real opponent. “If you lose we will lose the championship,” Ferguson before concerns become a reality. - Gary Neville is predicted that the end result will determine the two teams the next three years the trend, “I have participated many times Manchester derby, but this is a special significance, because a victory, allowing Manchester City players have the courage and self-confidence heart, in the next few years, Manchester City will become a strong contender for the championship, this game tonight, there may be innovations of the old pattern of the Premier League. “

Seems that after the game, all the positive backward Manchester City! If you won after an absence of 44 years (1968) for a long time the league title with a double play Manchester United results, 2012 is bound to Manchester City in the history of the most important, it symbolizes the birth of a new steel team. The fact that Shanghai is not only that, this season, the Premier League twice in the Manchester derby clash, Manchester City a total of coming down to Manchester United seven goals, a “noisy neighbor” Manchester City fear is really the United hearts slightly shocked!

FA surprising choice Hodgson entered the "Three Lions

FA Premier League West Bromwich Albion coach Roy Hodgson on the 30th interview of four hours, almost has determined that the England coach, a new term.

Capello resigned in February, the England coach candidates will become one of the major mysteries of international football. Final FA unexpectedly Hodgson took over the “Three Lions”, rather than the highest vocal coach Redknapp

The FA sent the interview Hodgson four-member inspection team, including Bernstein, Chairman of the FA, the England football “big brother” on the 29th through the official statement to confirm that Hodgson is currently enough total only contact with the coach. After an interview Hodgson, smiling to leave the new Wembley Stadium, and the voice from within the FA said that the results of the interview was “very good”.

West Bromwich Albion team of Hodgson took over the England team, he coached the “green light”, which is considered one of the main reasons for the FA to give up Redknapp’s. After all, would like to Tottenham Hotspur, “poaching” Redknapp, the FA will have to pay 10 million pounds in compensation.

Missed the England job to very sorry, but Harry Redknapp was quite gentlemanly blessing forHodgson, “If Roy (Hodgson) took office, I will wish him luck, he is a good coach, and I have taken a good job at Tottenham. “

64-year-old Hodgson coaching experience, has coached the national team of Switzerland, Saudi Arabia and Finland, at the club despite a charge of such giants Inter Milan and Liverpool, but the results are not satisfactory.

AC Milan leading player leave agreement exposure?Goodbye!

According to Dutch media reports, has been wavering on the fate ofMark van Bommelfinally made the decision to AC Milan next season’s lineup, we most likely will not be able to see the shadow of the defensive midfielder.

This is a message from the Dutch domestic football World, Mark van Bommel has been accepted Eindhoven given a one-year contract, he will be in the season with AC Milancontract after the expiration of a formal farewell. “Football world”, Eindhoven will soon officially announce the news. Mark van Bommel and AC Milan, like Layiaola said, “Over the past year and a half will become fond memories.” Van Bommel joined AC Milan in January last year, has since been the defensive midfielder position Allegri’s first choice, his arrival, the final victory against AC Milan last season, has played a vital role.

Mark van Bommel is the reason why not in talks with AC Milan before a decision, on the one hand, the objective existence is because of family reasons, on the other hand, Mark van Bommel I feel physical decline, since the estimate is likely after a year high against the the game unable to AC Milan has already begun the first wave of contract negotiations, but the contract provided by the club Gattuso, Ambrosini and Alessandro Nesta, also this season appearances than them more Mark van Bommel feel a bit disheartened.

For AC Milan, more trouble is, they need to find a high level of lumbar new season, midfielder of AC Milan will face tremendous change from the current point of view, Seedorf and Mark van Bommel, Flamini will certainly leave Aquilani up less than automatic buyout of appearances, joined the summer it is difficult because Liverpool are unlikely to he disposed of a price of less than 6 million. Buying, in addition to Montolivo and Traore has been finalized, certainly at least one playing center midfielder position players next season, joining the world of football, “said the most likely solution the program is a 22-year-old Eindhoven midfielder Stroman, AC Milan has been very interested in him worth about 15 million euros.

Barcelona want to sale the four years of absolute hero Alves

Alves is a very long time are the main Barcelona unshakable, but his prospects in Barcelona has already cast a shadow. Alves on the edge guard position, is not satisfactory, the efficiency of his field in the squad being called into question some of the activities of his presence, but also make him a high-level focus on the object. World Sports Daily “Marca” Spain to several media reports, Barcelona do not rule out the possibility of Alves in the summer cleaning.

There is no doubt that barcelona is now experiencing the worst moments of their own to join Barcelona since, while he himself should accept full responsibility. Alves in the past for a long time are the pillars of Barcelona, is the main undisputed, is one of the squad players playing time, but now, in some important games, he even became a substitute, such as the Chelsea the game he had been to exclude the outside of the lineup, but even play, his performance suffered teammates and questioned.

Rayo Vallecano game, Alves was again on the bench, he get a chance to play in the second half, after Tiago scored Alves and Tiago danced with dance, the results was the criticism of Puyol. On the bench, and Josep Guardiola and Vilanova also very seriously looking at this scene in the locker room after the game, they Alves Tiago’s behavior to be a warning, asking them not to such things do not respect the opponent.

Even the Catalan media also admitted Alves unsatisfactory performance in recent months, he has lost the support of the locker room. In the plane from Madrid to Barcelona, Alves in sitting in one corner, bow to playing with their phones, this performance stands in stark contrast with Barcelona teammates, Messi, Pinto, Javier Mascherano, they were very happy to play board games. One year after the contract with Barcelona until 2015 (breach of contract payments, up to 150 million euros), Alves seemed to have squandered the part of the future in Barcelona. Now become increasingly loud rumors about that he will leave this summer, Guardiola performance Alves, dissatisfied with the views of Vilanova is the same.

Barcelona club know that if the sale of players such as Alves, Barcelona can get very high income, because the club willing to pay a premium for the Alves transfer market, it is learned that the Russian security Zhi club is willing to Alves € 40 million transfer fee, provided annual salary than he was in Barcelona to high

Real Madrid won three times thanks to Higuain


The Higuain worthy of the title of Real Madrid lucky again, he became the hero of Real Madrid win the final battle to win. In court Shengmameisi, Athletic Bilbao fans extremely hostile atmosphere, Real Madrid got the first 32 La Liga trophy in club history. Interestingly, and four years ago in Pamplona to help Real Madrid summit, Higuain presented a priceless goal in the win of the night. In addition, Real Madrid won the La Liga champions in 2007, the goal Higuain also played an important role.

Spain “Le Monde” said after the game, Higuain again the team came through on his shoulders, he has once again become the protagonist of the Real Madrid won the night, like a repeat of the same old movies, Higuain in the team most in need , when they play the role of the lone hero. The Argentine show standards, and demonstrated the ability to fight. Throughout the weekAthletic Bilbao, the media exposed the news about Higuain will leave Real Madrid after the end of the season, but Iraq melon because of his own future where he must play well and the current football, to prove their for the existence of Real Madrid is very important.

Before Real Madrid against Athletic Bilbao, Barcelona victory over Malaga at home, despite the victory against Barcelona is just soothing, but Real Madrid in order to win in advance, have to beat Athletic Bilbao on the road line. However, Athletic Bilbao fans of Real Madrid has always been unfriendly, rejected the contractor of the King’s Cup final this season at Real Madrid, the Basque Lions fans on Real Madrid’s attitude is even more harsh, so the atmosphere is not suitable for Real Madrid win . However, the Real Madrid squad Higuain, the Argentines are good at the outbreak in the face of adversity, in C Ronaldomissing a penalty after 16 minutes of Barcelona, he kicked accurate shot blew open the Athletic Bilbao goal, the ball close to goal left column into the net, Athletic Bilbao goalkeeper Golkar did not do anything. In 2008, Higuain once again proved the ability to decide the game at the crucial moment.

Iguazu because Real Madrid open cans, after Real Madrid’s victory is also a matter of course. There is no doubt that Higuain has once again become a crucial figure in the most important moment, he once again helped Real Madrid lock the Spanish champions. Higuain is the “mascot” of Real Madrid, he always used the key goal to bring luck to the team. May 12, 2007, Real Madrid, the Spaniards, when the game 89 minutes, the two sides of the score is still 3, the key moment Higuain appeared, he scored a decisive one goal for Real Madrid to get a valuable three points, Fabio Capello’s Real Madrid also points standings beyond Barcelona leapt to the head, and ultimately reversing Barcelona win. After one season, Higuain broke out in the final stage of the season game of the 2007-08 season against Osasuna, Higuain 89 minutes into the go-ahead a ball to help Real Madrid to achieve the final victory of the competition, helping Real Madrid to take to the first 31 league titles.

Real Madrid last 3 wins have Higuain of Argentina’s “key man” figure, if Real Madrid ultimately let go of the key man, perhaps it is a huge regret. Marca reported that Higuain feel he is a pure Real Madrid, under normal circumstances he would not choose to leave Real Madrid, the Argentine 19-year-old came to the Spanish capital, and he loved Madrid and Real Madrid, after he has been own family, said: “Block 10 of the Champions League Real Madrid did not win, I will not leave Real Madrid.” Opinion polls show that nearly 70% of fans think that, even if other clubs out of the price of € 40 million, Real Madrid should not be selling Higuain. But recently, Higuain is certainly not happy, his own future at Real Madrid, appeared shaken, declared that if Real Madrid kick the ball, he would consider leaving Real Madrid after the end of the season.

Perhaps, the win will make Higuain change their views. Real Madrid win Iguazu due, said: “I am very satisfied, very happy. And Real Madrid have a contract, at the moment are not talking about this (transfer problem), the need to do now is money, after all, this title is after a year of hard, let us also the end of a three-year independent history of our teammates, whether good times or bad, can respond to and are willing to sacrifice everything. “for their own goals, Higuain seems proud of: “all the goals I have to enjoy the same, of course, the goal today is certainly very special.

Chelsea, at best, Malouda only be regarded as a role player


The game against Newcastle United, Chelsea maintained a 26-year unbeaten at Stamford Bridge. The 2002-2003 season to 2007-2008 season, the Blues made a six-game winning streak at home. 0-2 today, but let Chelsea in the league compete for the first four road almost come to an end.

Today, DiMatteo, head coach of the Blues come in a mixed lineup, Matta’s position be replaced by Malouda. However, finally groan appearances, the French man, but could not give the coach to mention gas. Played 61 minutes, Malouda shot only 1 time, 38 minutes, Torres on the right to turn around and catch pass, turned around after the break, Malouda before nodding the ball from the center, the ball was wide of the far post, Stamford Bridge The court issued a sigh.

Within an hour, Florent malouda on the team’s contribution is almost zero. Malouda’s header replaced with captain John Terry, then the ball all likelihood will be the top goal door, but perhaps too want to become the hero of the team, the magnitude of the Frenchman shakes too much. The game 44 minutes, Malouda in the circle cross force is too small, Diao Te tackles, Newcastle immediately formed a counter-attack, Dunbar - Pakistan had the ball charging into the restricted area, go past Ivanovic defense the far corner of the playing door, thanks to Petr Cech nimble ball-bashing bottom line. After completion of the fighting, Cech appears to be very angry, obviously, he do not blame Ivanovic, but the midfielder lost the ball Malouda.

This season, substitute Florent Maloudacompletely reduced, only 2089 minutes playing time, in which the league is only 1078 minutes. Standing player, whether it is the total playing time or the league playing time, he only Biluomeiwu and Michael Essien. Game, despite Malouda scored goals, but that is just one of the most simple in the restricted area Jianlou 90 minutes then Torres heel has thrown the ball, almost missed the restricted line of long-range, I am afraid is his true state of the reaction.

Malouda playing in make up. DiMatteo does not necessarily have to know the status of Malouda in the doldrums, but in the case of Frank Lampard and the rest Mata, Italy to make this choice is forced. Process, might as well come Romeu exercise, but it happens Romeu was not included in the bench. But even if it is to play the bench, Malouda is still unwilling Frenchman contract expires in 2013, but also want a new contract, not to accept a bench role, he can only so Hao Zhao.

England legend Paul - Mohsen, Maludada less than Chelsea’s standards. In the past five years, despite the occasional flash, but most of the time, Malouda in Chelsea, at best, only be regarded as a role player. In old age, his status dropped significantly, so it is not new. Malouda has said: “After the 2014 World Cup, I would choose to hang up his boots.” In other words, he has entered the twilight of his career. But see him now, the Brazilian World Cup can not attend are still unknown. Even so, 17 days after the Champions League final, DiMatteo I’m afraid to make no choice: send Malouda played. Because Ramirez and Meireleis, that day should be suspended, while a guest at the Allianz Arena, Chelsea must consider the hardness of the midfield, the case of Malouda defense a little better in several winger. Therefore, in Bayern Munich , I am afraid DiMatteo also once again no choice Frenchman.

Available for the selection of five midfield where Chelsea 4231 Champions League final:

Midfielder: Mikel, Lampard, Essien, Romeu

Avant-garde attack: Matta, Salomon Kalou, Stewart Ritchie, Malouda

C Ronaldo: ahead the Barcelona Seven points to won excited!

Real Madrid away 3-0 win over Athletic Bilbao to win the clubs first 32 league titles. After the game, Iker Casillas, Real Madrid captain, very pleased, he said: “This is the time to be happy, because this season is very long and very difficult compared to last season, this season we move a small step. Champions LeagueWe regret, hope that next season we can make up for this deficiency. “

“The manager is also an important contributor.” Casillas went on to say, “We need to champion dedicated to all eager to league title Real Madridand we look forward to next season to go further in the competition to defeat such a team in Barcelona very difficult, but we did the Champions League is our regret, but now we want to enjoy the joy of the league title. “

Missed a penalty, but C Ronaldo has once again become the protagonist of Real Madrid. Real Madrid win the league title this night,C Ronaldosay their feelings: “This is so happy. This is the league title for the first time I get in Spain, I am very pleased. League win is our greatest wish this wish come true. “

“In the locker room, everyone was very happy, because after 10 months of struggling women struggled, we finally got what they wanted, and league win of the difficulty is the largest and perhaps the most difficult I have experienced first win. the face of such a team competition in Barcelona, ??more difficult to win the league title, but such a win to feel better, because of the very good feeling to overcome such a top team to win. We are leading them to seven points, we have more than they as well. “

, C Ronaldo is not very concerned about this season’s European Golden Boot. He said: “I want the league title. My family has two Golden Boot to retake one or can not get it does not matter we are very excited and looking forward to the morning and celebrate the win . “

Ramos said excitedly: to win the championship trophy from the strong hands of Barcelona, ??we are very happy to congratulate all the Real Madrid man. Square this evening or tomorrow morning we will go to the harvest goddess and celebrate the win, I will lift the trophy, but not the trophy fell to Real Madrid is a fair champion, we want the trophy dedicated to all Real Madrid fans is not easy, because it is a long season, they accompany us to participate in many events. This is my personal first league title three times, I am very pleased. “

Barcelona coachJosep Guardiolaon a lot of things were covered, “saying, Ramos said only one sentence:” We do not want to evaluate other people say. “

Own goals to help Real Madrid win the Argentine striker Higuain as one would like to celebrate a league win. After the game, Higuain said: “I am now at Real Madrid very happy, and I still under contract, this is not to discuss personal future.”

On this win, Higuainsaid: “after a lapse of three years, we finally won this feeling very good. We are very proud of the performance of the season my goal makes me happy, but today This goal makes a difference. “

Juventus must not be lost, once there is any room for error,


Juventus a 1-1 draw with Lecce team, Juventus full match at an advantage, Lecce team’s tenacious results received in the first 85 minutes, Buffon mistake ruined the team in league there are two circumstances, win situation becomes confusing them, we can say Conti’s team has spent an opportunity to make mistakes, in the next two games, Juventus must not be lost, once there is any room for error, the winner may be sidelined others.

“Gazzetta dello Sport” It seems that even the Juventus champion’s determination to not Lecce teams relegation determination is far greater, the whole game Lecce team have been overwhelmed, nobody expected to Lecce teams will take points on the road, not to mention Juventus had previously connected Keqiang Di made a wave of seven game winning streak in the bone eye, who does not think that the Lecce team Juventus check Juventus players, but in the end Lecce team players will to overcome the will. Sky Sports also hold the same view, Juventus winning streak was a wave carried away the whole of Italy are on their praise, leading the team in a ball, playing 10 and 11, it seems walking on this can be seen from the performance of the team the second half, it seems that an end of the game, the team’s slack outrageous, and the fatal errors is precisely the most stable team 2 players who, Barzagli the Tachiyama ball back to the messenger Buffon caught off guard, and Buffon’s siege enough amateur, the status of the two players, is a microcosm of the mentality of the team, Lecce team is with this The goal of the game’s only shot in the goal to get a valuable one. As Lecce coach Cosmi said: “Lecce team worthy of one minute, they fought to the last 1 second, Juve did not.”

“Full market” to remind Juventus suffered a relapse, before the face of Naples, Lazio, Rome, and other powerful enemies, the smooth clearance of the team, and beat the big score, but the face is not worth mentioning small chili Lecce, Juventus, it seems how also could not get the spirit of team play loose, lost season, which is probably the most important. If this tie then lost the final championship, then this price is also a bit a bit too much, at Juventus before the biggest enemy is not AC Milan, but their attitude.

Of course, there is a figure I must mention is the Lecce coach Cosmi, as early as in 1999/2000 season, the critical moment of the Juventus champion, the team in the away defeat was Perugia team, which sake final Lazio win Perugia coach is the Cosmi, and now after 12 after, Cosmi once again become the stumbling block of the Juventus win on the road, do not know this time Juve Figure Sri Lanka will not be planted in the Cosmi the hands and eventually lost the championship. The Turin Sports Daily said: “It is not controversial is the embroidery of the first three stars, all wait to get the title say it, and now Juventus won what? Not yet received anything.”

If we say that before the current round, Juventus ahead of AC Milan, two body, then, after the current round of AC Milan has apparently is caught up with a body position, AC Milan, has been pressing harder and harder to Juventus, Once Ewing mistakes again, the winner is likely to be AC Milansnatched away. In the last two games, Juventus will face the challenge Cagliari Atlanta should be said that these two teams are in the middle, and has been ahead of relegation from the surface, Juventus faced difficulties does not seem particularly large, But that was only the performance of the phenomenon of “market”, said of them in Serie A, you can not ignore any team, especially the final stage of the season, the players for their future, indeed, which in the past two, has been ahead of the downgrade of Cesena and Novara have a good performance, Cagliari Atlanta strength can not be underestimated, Atlanta, if the operator be deducted 6 points, points and even more than Roma and Cagliari at home has been one of the hardest kick in the Serie A home, so as Conti said: “Juventus only victory in the last two games, to be able to win. “

Although Barcelona hasn't won? but instead more money


The former general manager of the FC Barcelona, ??Joan Oliver is a controversial figure. He had half-jokingly, half in earnest, Barcelona reached the finals of many competitions, winning the club’s finances is the best contribution. That is to say, Barcelona can be the team advance to the finals of all income into the bag, but do not have to “waste” for the team to win huge bonuses. This statement is certainly controversial, but a true reflection of this season, Real Madrid have won La Liga champions Barcelona harvest runner-up, Champions League, Barcelona stop the semi-finals, this is the case of bonus distribution will be 2012-2013 season to have a significant impact. One can imagine, the Barcelona signings for next season will be changed significantly.

According to the daily sports newspaper reported this season, Barcelona Chelsea were eliminated from the Champions League, La Liga is almost no hope of defending, so they left the King’s Cup contention, but disappointment on the pitch may be with the club next season signings to benefits. In the present circumstances, led by the Sports Ministry to Andoni Zubizarreta estimated that Barcelona dominated this summer signings funds of close to 100 million euros.

The daily sports newspaper “,” 100 million euros “huge amounts of money comes mainly from four aspects. The first source is the budget of the club to prepare for each season signings. Due to the impact of the economic crisis, Barcelona from last season on the reduction of expenditure in this area, the last two years transfer fee budget of about € 50 million, next season’s budget may not be more than 30 million euros. If you the Vilanova want to supplement these funds, he must consider the sale of the existing players.

Andoni Zubizarreta and Vilanovaconvinced that the summer sale of the player’s operation will bring about 30 million euros to Barcelona. Barcelona will not be revealed that the player’s name to be sold in advance, players and coaches in order to avoid unnecessary stress, at the same time prevent the devaluation of the players. However, there are indications that Alves, Keita and one or two youth players will leave Barcelona, ??the transfer fee will be directly added to the signings budget.

The third source of funds available is not to win the prize money saved, including the Champions League and La Liga. The last few seasons, due to the Barcelona record shine through, the club used to reward players and coaches of funds are very impressive. This season, Barcelona missed the reality of the La Liga and the Champions League trophy will save the club with more than 3000 million euros. Clubs and many other areas subject to the budget deficit impact the case, so the amount of funds is definitely a temporary relief, especially the operation of the introduction of new players.

A source of disposable income Guardiola, because his departure for Barcelona to save wage costs. Vilanova succeed Guardiola as first team coach, his salary income will be significantly improved, but even so, the coach’s replacement in the new season can still save the cost of nearly € 10 million for Barcelona.

Barcelona executives realized that the team now need to add one or two top players, therefore, the only revenue With a budget of 30 million euros and selling players is not enough. With nearly one hundred million euros in available funds, Barcelona can be like them on the pitch, as with other giants in the transfer market to compete.

New players joining means Arsenal will leave According to the Mirror revealed that several players out on loan, such as Andrei Arshavin, Carlos - Vela, Denilson, Bendtner next season has may leave. Also in terms of the coaching staff, due to play for Arsenal for 48-year-old assistant coach Pat - Rice decided to retire, youth team coach Steve Bald will succeed Pat - Morales became Arsenal’s chief assistant coach.

I congratulate him.”

Ronaldinho Olympic dream has been shattered?

According to Agence France-Presse news, the former world footballer Ronaldinho will almost certainly miss this summer’s Olympic Games in London, in four warm-up matches, the list of the Brazilian national team preparing for the Olympics were not to see the name of the former Barcelona core.

Brazil coach Mano Menezes’s 23-man selection for the Olympic warm-up match, Chelsea, David - Lewis, AC Milan, Tiago - Silva, Alves, Barcelona, Real Madrid’s Marcelo Hu Erke and Porto are fully selected, the other from the local team in Brazil Santos supernova Nei Maer suspense selected.

It is reported that Ronaldinho not received the call of the coach to join the list of warm-up match is likely to be related to negative news because he repeatedly broke in its host club Flamengo. Been reported, the Flamengo club due to financial problems, once arrears Ronaldinho’s wages for up to four months long. Ronaldinho itself competitive state than in the not too distant last season in terms of, there have been a small decline. , In the case of full choice as coach of the Brazilian national team, Menezes apparently not willing to bring the characters to go to London.

Menezes mentioned in the press conference: “The fans should be aware of our team sometimes need to find one for the team to solve the problem at a critical time, and now, we hope to see more young people to do that. “

32-year-old Ronaldinho has infinite expectation to have the opportunity on behalf of the Brazilian team standing on the Olympic champion on the podium. His last tour of the Olympic Games in Beijing in 2008, when he led the favorites Brazil, all the way to immediate concern to the semi-finals, when the Workers’ Stadium in Beijing will have to face later champion, their South American rivals , Argentina. In that match-ups, Ronaldinho facing his former teammate in Barcelona with Messi as close as brothers, doing all they could, but still did not restore the team 0-3 defeat ending his The first Olympic champion dream, also will be halted.

May 26 to June 9, the team of Brazil and Denmark, the United States, Mexico and the old enemy Argentina, a total play four warm-up matches. However, Ronaldinho own as well as his fans expect, in accordance with the provisions of the Brazilian submitted to a 35 reduction list will be June 8 and July 6 to determine the final list of 18 entries, and perhaps to when Ronaldinho’s dream of Olympic champion still has a chance instead.

Attached a detailed list:

Goalkeepers: Jefferson (Botafogo), Neto (Florence), Raphael (Santos).

Defenders: Daniel Alves (Barcelona), Danilo (Porto), Marcelo (Real Madrid), Alex - Sandro (Porto), Tiago - Silva (AC Milan), Wei - Louis (Chelsea), Juan (Inter Milan), Bruno Wuwei Ni (Tottenham).

Midfielders: Sandro (Tottenham), Casimiro (Sao Paulo), Luo wood Luo (Vasco da Gama), Giuliano (Ukraine Denis general), Gansel (Santos), Oscar (Brazil International), Lucas (Sao Paulo).

Forwards: Pato (AC Milan), Nei Maer (Santos), Hu Ik (Porto), Da Miang (Brazil), Wellington - (Fluminense).

AC Milan's Nesta Appointed Silva is his successor

A large number of AC Milan’s veteran left the band, but some people go, men will stay, “Milan News in Milanello, hired away from Silva’s offensive in great length in the period of time since the Spanish media reported that Barcelona at noon yesterday, Silva presenting the award, interview, made it clear that he will stay at AC Milan.

This is the best player of AC Milan, the Milan News Readers’ Poll Award season awards, Silva said: “This award means a lot for me, and this is because I was two years in a row reelected, reelected once. increasingly difficult this year, just one percentage point victory over Boateng, I hope I can have a good performance next year and continue to get this award, because I am still motivated, I want to be able to continue to AC Milan a good the performance. “

In yesterday’s press conference, NeisitaAppointed Silva’s successor, Silva I this how to treat it? “I feel a huge responsibility,” Silva said previously as Maldini’s successor, I felt a responsibility, because I wish I could well take over his position, and now, a great players Nesta left … To be honest I find it difficult to describe a star like Nesta, he is really good, we fight side by side in the past two years, he gave me a great help, I’m sorry his departure to AC Milan is a loss. “

From the start of next season, Silva will be the leader of the defensive line, the Brazilian said: “All good players are burdened with great responsibility, I am saddled with a large proportion of the responsibility, but are not my team together if we are committed to our goal, then we are able to make great achievements, AC Milan, more than Tiago - Silva, we have a lot of good players,’ll be able to have good performance . “

This Sunday, AC Milan will bid farewell to a large number of legendary players, Silva said, “lost Nesta, Seedorf, Inzaghi, Gianluca Zambrotta, AC Milan will lose a lot, suddenly bid farewell to them is not easy to accept things, if you want to build a new team, about 100% of the shake-up is not easy, you need to have some master player, now on the shoulders of players such as Ibrahim burden is even heavier, but there are some players, they done a good job last season, such as Nocerino, as said before, we were able to make great achievements, from now on. “

Silva, 33, figures the sum is 6, which is the number of fans of Franco BaresiTherefore Silva Baresi’s successor, the Barresi himself more than once mentioned that this Silva how to see it? “I am very pleased to be able to be compared with Baresi, because he is a superstar,” Silva said, “I hope to continue this performance, because I have many reasons to continue to fight for AC Milan,” Silva said “I want to be able to continue to write Baresi and Paolo Maldini of AC Milan legend.”
